Package net.ucanaccess.util

Class VersionInfo

java.lang.Object
net.ucanaccess.util.VersionInfo
public final class VersionInfo extends Object
The purpose of this class is to find the project's version information by all means possible,
  • while developing the project in an IDE
  • while running Maven lifecycle goals or
  • while executing or referencing the project at run-time, whether packaged or not.
. First this class attempts to read version information from key Attributes.Name.IMPLEMENTATION_VERSION in the Java manifest by using the Java api.

Should this operation fail, it looks for a MANIFEST.MF in the file system in order to read version information from the first file found.

In case this also fails, it looks for the project's Maven POM file to extraxct version information from the xml structure.

Since:
v5.1.2
Author:
Markus Spann
